sense.def:
The peak of a process or activity
je točka, ko ima neko dogajanje ali dejavnost največji zamah, ko je najbolj uspešno ali najbolj razvito.

seg.quote: They were trained to a peak of physical fitness.
Computer technology has not yet reached its peak.

sense.def:
Ko oseba ali dogajanje
peaks
, doseže največjo vrednost ali je najbolj uspešno.

seg.quote: The annual workload peaks at harvest time.

sense.def:
Kadar je vrednost ali stopnja nečesa
peak
, je največja.

seg.quote: ...a peak output of 165 cars per day.

sense.def:
A peak
je gora ali njen zgornji del.

seg.quote: It is one of the highest peaks in the Alps.

sense.def:
Na čepici je
a peak
del na sprednji strani, ki štrli nad očmi.
